animeDescription: Mini specials bundled with each Blu-ray/DVD volume of Seireitsukai no Blade Dance.  Each special is tied to the new 32-page short story that original light novel author Shimizu Yuu wrote for the limited first pressing of every Blu-ray/DVD volume.
animeCharacters: ['Est, Terminus', 'Kazehaya, Kamito', 'Rouge, Claire', 'Fahrengart, Ellis', 'Ray Ordesia, Fianna', 'Laurenfrost, Rinslet', 'Ashdoll, Restia', 'Nastassja, Carol', 'Grandol, Freya']
animeVoices: ['Kakuma, Ai', 'Furukawa, Makoto', 'Kido, Ibuki', 'Ishigami, Shizuka', 'Oonishi, Saori', 'Yuuki, Kana', 'Hikasa, Youko', 'Tanaka, Manami']
